amendment.description: Amendment prohibits any of the funds made available in the Act from being used to send or otherwise pay for the attendance of more than 50 employees from a Federal department or agency at any single conference occurring outside the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibt any of the funds made available in the Act from being used to send or otherwise pay for the attendance of more than 50 employees from a Federal department or agency at any single conference occurring outside the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garrett (NJ) amendment (A046) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A046) offered by Mr. Garrett (NJ).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Garrett (NJ) amendment (A046) Agreed to by voice vote.
